Question: This person's line in the film was "Mime is money." He later starred in the action comedy Running Scared (1986).
Hints: Portraying himself in a video, this person introduces museum guests to the genealogy wing of the museum.
In 1986, this person started hosting Comic Relief on HBO with Robin Williams and Whoopi Goldberg.
This person also was well known for his impressions of Yankee Hall of Famer turned broadcaster Phil Rizzuto.
